exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a0 : Term A n p : list (Term A n) a : Term A n H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) IHp : eqP A eqA n (mults a p) p Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (mults a p) p" with "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a a0) (mults a p)) (a0 :: p)".

original: simpl. intros p a H. induction p. - simpl. auto. - simpl. apply IHp.
